title: Mechanical Engineer NEW!
full_description: Seeking an experienced mechanical engineer contractor for a product development company. Our company engineers, prototypes, and manufactures products across a variety of industries, including medical, sports/fitness, electronics, technology products, pet products, kitchen products, and consumer products, to name a few. Our ideal candidate has been in the product development industry for 20+ years and has extensive knowledge of DFM and SolidWorks. Often times our clients look to us for creative mechanical solutions.
